column1: BIP404295210,Contract,"Waveney District Council",Awarded,2019-06-05T13:50:02Z,"GB-Lowestoft: Architect Support for the PSiCA Conservation Grant Scheme","Waveney District Council (WDC) is working in partnership with Historic England, Lowestoft Town Council and the East Suffolk Building Preservation Trust on the North Lowestoft Heritage Action Zone (HAZ). WDC have successfully applied to Historic England to run a PSiCA Conservation Grant Scheme, on the Lowestoft Historic High Street, which sits within the HAZ area. This grant scheme will run from 1 April 2019 for three years. The Conservation Grant Scheme is looking to buy in the services of a conservation accredited architect to help support the scheme on an ""as and when required basis"" throughout the life of the three year grant scheme.",,,"East of England","71200000 71000000 71221000 ","Amy Moye",procurement@eastsuffolk.gov.uk,Riverside,"4 Canning Road",Lowestoft,"NR33 0EQ",UK,01502562111,,,"https://www.delta-esourcing.com/delta/respondToList.html?noticeId=404295210 ","The contracting authority considers that this contract may be suitable for economic operators that are small or medium enterprises (SMEs). However, any selection of tenderers will be based solely on the criteria set out for the procurement.",23/04/2019,31/03/2022,22/04/2019,NO,,No,Yes,No,Services,36450,,22/04/2019,36450,"[Purcell Miller Tritton LLP

CHEAST001-DN293060-12478500,Contract,"Cheshire East Borough Council",Awarded,2019-01-18T09:22:11Z,"18 012 Construction Related Consultantcy Framework","Cheshire East Borough Council (Council and Employer) has awarded a consultants Framework for the provision of Construction related professional services. This Framework is to deliver Construction related professional services to all internal departments and any organisation that Cheshire East Borough Council is associated with along with schools, academies and Parish/Town Councils. The overall objective of the framework is to support the Council to deliver their revenue and capital programmes by; - Providing professional expertise on construction related projects, - Providing capacity and supplementary knowledge that allows flexibility where necessary to support existing Council services, - Providing cost certainty through use of the Framework for Commission delivery, - Standardise and streamline processes with the implementation of continuous feedback and performance improvements with regards to external resource, - Realise efficiencies through knowledge sharing and monitoring and management of performance in terms of cost and quality. The Framework will be divided into the following lots:- Lot 1 - Architectural Services Lot 2 - Building Services Engineering Lot 3 - Quantity Surveying Services Lot 4 - Structural Engineering Services Lot 5 - Building Surveying Services Lot 6 - Heritage Architectural Services Lot 7 - CDM Client Advisor Lot 8 - Environmental & Engineering Consultancy Services",,,"North West","71000000 ","Janet Ellison-Jones",janet.ellison-jones@cheshireeast.gov.uk,Westfields,"Middlewich Road",Sandbach,"CW11 1HZ",England,"+44 1270686456",http://www.cheshireeast.gov.uk/,,,"

Lot 1 - Contract Value £370k - £660k, Lot 2 Contract Value £190k - £340k, Lot 3 Contract Value £320k - £580k, Lot 4 Contract Value £100k - £190k, Lot 5 Contracts Value £140k - £270k, Lot 6 Contracts Value £530k - £960k, Lot 7 Contract Value £200k - £370k, Lot 8 Contract Value £250k -- £430k

There is a 12 month Option to extend to take the framework to 31/10/22.",01/11/2018,31/10/2021,07/08/2018,NO,,Yes,No,No,Services,3800000,3800000,23/10/2018,3800000,"[Lot 1 Halliday Meecham Architects Limited
